prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who raises the lowly — lift me to accomplish Your purposes.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 118:25: "Lord, save us! Lord, grant us success!"
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 16:9: "The heart of man plans his way, but the Lord establishes his steps."
prayer.intention: Let my work today compound into something that outlasts me.
prayer.closing: Go in peace. Build with purpose. Return with gratitude.

family.title: ❤️ Family Focus
family.suggestion: Saturday morning: Make pancakes together with Jones (he can help pour batter!), then backyard play while it's cool. Jett can watch from his bouncer — he loves watching his big brother.
family.conversationStarter: Ask Jillian: 'What's been the best thing you've read lately?' — she loves talking about books and you showing genuine interest in her world.
family.weeklyGoal: Tomorrow is Sunday Sweet Breakfast! Plan something special together tonight. Also check: when's the next monthly date night?
family.potencyAction: Ask: 'What do you need from me right now?' and do it. (Relationship temp is critical — ratio 1.5:1. Focus on repair. Listen without defending.)
family.reflection: Parashat Toldot is about generational blessing and inheritance. Today, be present with your boys — they're watching how you love their mother. That's the inheritance that matters.
